item.description:
Good News Everyone!
After the poll was closed, it looks like the book for the September meetup will be The Whipping Star by Frank Herbert. Thank you Ashley for the suggestion! The other book from the poll, Haindmaid's Tale, was very good as well, I recommend you give it a try.

We will be meeting again at Pandemonium in Central Square. There is free parking (after 6pm) in Central on Prospect Street. There is also a lot around the corner from Pandemonium on Green Street ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there!
-Josh
item.name: September Book Club
